Name: & Iron Spike~
Description: A spike taken from the gates of Mordor.
Description translation: A spike taken from the gates of Mordor.

Name: & Flask~ of oil
Description: It can be used to fuel a lantern with 7500 turns of light, up to a maximum of 15000 turns of light.  When thrown, it is considered lit, so it does more than nominal damage (which occurs even against creatures resistant to fire).
Description translation: Она может быть использована для заправки лампы на 7500 ходов света (вплоть до 15000).  When thrown, it is considered lit, so it does more than nominal damage (which occurs even against creatures resistant to fire).

Name: & Ration~ of Food
Description: This nutritious but fairly bland food is familiar to anyone contemplating long journeys.
Description translation: This nutritious but fairly bland food is familiar to anyone contemplating long journeys.

Name: & Slime Mold~
Description: A strange fungal growth, prone to moving if not observed.  Not very tasty but quite filling.
Description translation: A strange fungal growth, prone to moving if not observed.  Not very tasty but quite filling.

Name: & Piece~ of Elvish Waybread
Description: Food of the elves is always good; their waybread is no exception.  These thin cakes are wrapped in leaves and keep their tastiness for months.
Description translation: Food of the elves is always good; their waybread is no exception.  These thin cakes are wrapped in leaves and keep their tastiness for months.

Name: & Hard Biscuit~
Description: A filling if tooth-breaking biscuit made mostly of rye.
Description translation: A filling if tooth-breaking biscuit made mostly of rye.

Name: & Flask~ of Whisky
Description: It raises your spirits.
Description translation: It raises your spirits.

Name: & Pint~ of Fine Wine
Description: A fine way to wash down some otherwise unappetising rations.
Description translation: A fine way to wash down some otherwise unappetising rations.

Name: Stoneskin
Description: Its poison turns your skin to stone, albeit briefly.
Description translation: Its poison turns your skin to stone, albeit briefly.

Name: & Dagger~
Description: A short two-edged blade perfect for thrusting.
Description translation: A short two-edged blade perfect for thrusting.

Name: & Cutlass~
Description: A thicker and slightly longer dagger, the cutlass is a slashing sword.  It possesses a slight curve and only one side is sharp.
Description translation: A thicker and slightly longer dagger, the cutlass is a slashing sword.  It possesses a slight curve and only one side is sharp.

Name: & Tulwar~
Description: A wider-bladed cousin of the shamshir, with less of a curve.
Description translation: A wider-bladed cousin of the shamshir, with less of a curve.

Name: & Scimitar~
Description: A long sabre with an extreme curve to the blade.
Description translation: A long sabre with an extreme curve to the blade.

Name: & Zweihander~
Description: A sword designed for two hands.
Description translation: A sword designed for two hands.

Name: & Arrow~
Description: It can be shot with a bow.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из лука.

Name: & Seeker Arrow~
Description: It can be shot with a bow.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из лука.

Name: & Mithril Arrow~
Description: It can be shot with a bow.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из лука.

Name: & Bolt~
Description: It can be shot with a crossbow.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из арбалета.

Name: & Seeker Bolt~
Description: It can be shot with a crossbow.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из арбалета.

Name: & Mithril Bolt~
Description: It can be shot with a crossbow.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из арбалета.

Name: & Rounded Pebble~
Description: It can be shot with a sling.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из пращи.

Name: & Iron Shot~
Description: It can be shot with a sling.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из пращи.

Name: & Mithril Shot~
Description: It can be shot with a sling.
Description translation: Они могут быть выпущены из пращи.

Name: & Pair~ of Leather Sandals
Description: A set of open-topped footgear with soft calfskin lacings and a sturdy cured leather base.
Description translation: A set of open-topped footgear with soft calfskin lacings and a sturdy cured leather base.

Name: & Cloak~
Description: A traveller's sturdy outer garment.
Description translation: A traveller's sturdy outer garment.

Name: & Fur Cloak~
Description: A heavy cloak made from fur and lined with leather; a luxury.
Description translation: A heavy cloak made from fur and lined with leather; a luxury.

Name: & Elven Cloak~
Description: A mantle made of curious silken material by the Galadrim that wondrously takes on the hues and shapes of its surroundings.
Description translation: A mantle made of curious silken material by the Galadrim that wondrously takes on the hues and shapes of its surroundings.

Name: & Ethereal Cloak~
Description: This unearthly, completely transparent body mantle folds and drapes in iridescent patterns around you.  It weighs absolutely nothing.
Description translation: This unearthly, completely transparent body mantle folds and drapes in iridescent patterns around you.  It weighs absolutely nothing.

Name: & Set~ of Caestus
Description: An ancient battle glove designed for hand-to-hand fighting.  Its layered leather thongs are enhanced for combat by bloody-looking spikes.
Description translation: An ancient battle glove designed for hand-to-hand fighting.  Its layered leather thongs are enhanced for combat by bloody-looking spikes.

Name: & Set~ of Alchemist's Gloves
Description: Highly protective gloves designed for an alchemist's elemental magics.
Description translation: Highly protective gloves designed for an alchemist's elemental magics.

Name: & Wicker Shield~
Description: A light circular frame of wood surrounding fine-grained wickerwork.
Description translation: A light circular frame of wood surrounding fine-grained wickerwork.

Name: Damage
Description: It boosts your to-dam value.
Description translation: Оно увеличивает ваш бонус к урону.

Name: Accuracy
Description: It boosts your to-hit value.
Description translation: Оно увеличивает ваш бонус к удару.

Name: Slaying
Description: It boosts your to-hit and to-dam values.
Description translation: Оно увеличивает ваши бонусы к удару и урону.

Name: Protection
Description: It increases your armor class.
Description translation: Оно увеличивает вашу броню.
